title: Project-Based Science Education Design Through Flipped Learning Behavior Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic theories and research methodologies in the field of science
context.additional_context: Requirement for customized learning design considering job relevance for professionals while applying flipped learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze online resource access patterns (frequency, scope, timing) in a flipped learning environment
Learners can present the correlation between learning behavior data and academic achievement as project outcomes
Learners can design personalized learning strategies based on analytical results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
